ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: We need more information to help you. I have spent considerable time in kaesora, and I can tell you exaclty how to crack the library and the xalgoz areas with
ygData.messageBody:
We need more information to help you.

I have spent considerable time in kaesora, and I can tell you exaclty how to
crack the library and the xalgoz areas with small parties.

Tell me where you died and the levels and classes of your guild/group and I
can come up with an extraction plan for ya.

Draelon Stormsong

-----Original Message-----
From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 10:33 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble


Last night we (my bard and his guild) were on a guild raid of Kaesora.
Things were going great, when my ISP decided it was time to crash.

So now I am camped in the middle of a dangerous room with no chance of
running out. My guild is unlikely to be able to muster up enough force to
get there anytime soon (we are small, we needed outside help getting this
far). So what can i do? Any ideas?





Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
